text: <@UTQQ4TXCH> Hi! Did you figure it out?
Hi Thomas I did but thank you for checking.

Somehow my drop down menu is stuck behind the hero section and I can't seem to be able bring it to the top. I know it is there just hidden any ideas would be appreciated. <https://www.pageonepower.com/link-building-service> This page is built using a new theme I'm creating the rest of the site is based on a template we purchase a few years ago.
That is hiding the nav bar itself on scroll. Here is a better example of the issue in this image. I know it there just trapped behind.
Here I just added some negative margin.
Thank you <@U021H3TV338> for the fix "It’s not exactly “behind” the hero. You can either remove `overflow: hidden;` from `.header__container` or add `.header__container { overflow: initial; }"`
